text:
In the file $CATALINA_HOME/conf/Catalina/localhost/admin.xml when I add the
lines below in the <Context> :
<Valve className="org.apache.catalina.valves.RemoteHostValve"
  allow="lavande.ema.fr"/>

The access to the admin WebApp is denied from lavande.ema.fr. It works if I
replace the Valve above with :
<Valve className="org.apache.catalina.valves.RemoteAddrValve"
    allow="159.31.10.33"/>

Of course 159.31.10.33 is the IP address of lavande.ema.fr. It's not a network
access or a DNS problem because this works well on the same server when I use
Tomcat 4.1.29 ($CATALINA_HOME/conf/server.xml)

Best regards,
creator: Laurent.Pellissier@ema.fr
